entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Port Carling
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:37 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -7.6°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 8:10 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 8:10 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Snow beginning in the evening. Local amount 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 8:10 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
